SELECT s.MAT_LOT_CODE "matLotCode" , s.MAT_CODE "matCode" , h.INOUT_DATE "inputDate" , h.INOUT_CNT "inoutCnt" , 'IV1' "warehousingVehiclesCheck" , 'PFN' "foreignExist" , 'PSY' "packStatus" , 'MCY' "lastResult" , h.INOUT_CNT "goodCnt" , m.mat_code "matCode" , m.mat_name "matName" FROM MAT_DETAIL s JOIN MAT_INOUT_HISTORY h ON s.MAT_LOT_CODE = h.MAT_LOT_CODE JOIN mat m ON m.mat_code = s.mat_code
s.qlty_check_status = 'MI1'
AND s.MAT_LOT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{matLotCode}||'%'
AND trunc(h.INOUT_DATE) >= #{inoutDate} and trunc(h.INOUT_DATE) <= #{inoutDate2}
AND h.inout_sep = 'IN'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT d.MAT_LOT_CODE ,m.MAT_CODE ,d.WAREHOUSING_CNT ,d.CHECK_DONE_CNT ,d.QLTY_CHECK_STATUS ,m.MAT_NAME ,h.INOUT_DATE ,h.inout_sep ,c.last_result FROM MAT_DETAIL d JOIN MAT m ON m.MAT_CODE = d.MAT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MAT_INOUT_HISTORY h ON d.MAT_LOT_CODE = h.MAT_LOT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN MAT_QLTY_CHECK c ON c.MAT_LOT_CODE = d.MAT_LOT_CODE where d.qlty_check_status != 'MI1' and d.WAREHOUSING_CNT >= 1
AND m.MAT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{matCode}||'%'
AND trunc(h.INOUT_DATE) = to_Date(#{inoutDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY 1

SELECT d.PRODUCT_CODE , p.PRODUCT_NAME , d.PRODUCT_LOT_CODE , c.ALL_END_TIME , d.warehousing_cnt , d.qlty_check_status FROM PRODUCT p JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL d ON p.PRODUCT_CODE = d.PRODUCT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PROC_RESULT c ON c.PROC_RESULT_CODE = d.PROC_RESULT_CODE WHERE d.qlty_check_status ='PQ1'
AND trunc(c.ALL_END_TIME) = to_Date(#{allEndTime},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY 1

SELECT product_lot_code "productLotCode" , product_code "productCode" , 'PFN' "foreignExist" , 'PSY' "packStatus" , 'ACY' "addStand" , 'PWY' "productWeight" , 'PRY' "lastResult" , warehousing_cnt "goodCnt" , warehousing_cnt "warehousingCnt" FROM product_detail WHERE qlty_check_status = 'PQ1'
mapper.update: UPDATE product p SET p.stock_cnt = ( SELECT sum(d.remain_cnt) FROM product_detail d WHERE p.product_code = d.product_code GROUP BY d.product_code ) WHERE product_code = #{productCode}

SELECT d.product_code , d.prod_req_detail_code , h.product_lot_code , c.check_recv_date , c.last_result FROM PROD_PLAN_DETAIL d JOIN PRODUCT_INOUT_HISTORY h ON d.prod_req_detail_code = h.prod_req_detail_code right OUTER JOIN product_qlty_check c ON h.PRODUCT_LOT_CODE = c.PRODUCT_LOT_CODE
AND h.product_lot_code LIKE '%'||#{product_lot_code}||'%'
AND trunc(c.check_recv_date) = to_Date(#{checkRecvDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY 1

SELECT d.product_code , p.product_name ,c.check_recv_date ,c.last_result FROM PRODUCT p JOIN PRODUCT_DETAIL d ON p.PRODUCT_CODE = d.PRODUCT_CODE right OUTER JOIN product_qlty_check c ON d.PRODUCT_LOT_CODE = c.PRODUCT_LOT_CODE
AND d.PRODUCT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{product_code}||'%'
AND trunc(c.check_recv_date) = to_Date(#{checkRecvDate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ORDER BY 1
